name: Manage Users
description: Permission to create, edit, and delete user accounts

name: View Users
description: Permission to view user account lists and details

name: Manage User Credentials
description: Permission to reset and manage user passwords and credentials

name: View User Credentials
description: Permission to view user credentials information - accessKey only

name: Manage Roles
description: Permission to create, edit, and delete user roles

name: View Roles
description: Permission to view user roles and their associated permissions

name: Assign Roles
description: Permission to assign roles to users

name: Assign Role Permissions
description: Permission to assign permissions to roles

name: Manage Permissions
description: Permission to create, edit, and delete permissions

name: Assign User Permissions
description: Permission to assign specific permissions directly to users
